content: Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for this physical artwork viewable here:(The full Transmutation NFT animation with audio can be viewed as an Augmented Reality layer over the physical artwork with the free Artivive app.)https://streamable.com/1f3n75https://streamable.com/gnxtdxhttps://streamable.com/s2ezhuif the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 50$ Shipping ) + (EU 15$ Shipping)Physical artwork in size 44,6 x 64,6 cmCollectors Edition 3 of 3VOLCANIC – The Purifier of Humanity1. - “VOLCANIC – The Purifier of Humanity!” --- SOLD2. - “VOLCANIC – The Purifier of Humanity!” --- AVAILABLE3. - “VOLCANIC – The Purifier of Humanity!” --- AVAILABLEEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.LevinsTo claim the special/bonus edition, you will need to own 4 artworks: water, earth, fire and wind edition. This collection will work like a key for/to enter the Altar to claim the fifth artwork of these series.VOLCANIC – The Purifier of HumanityLike the saying “A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure despite overwhelming obstacles.” Volcanic was once an ordinary individual walking amongst many ordinary men, growing cold daily by the wickedness of the evil system in the world.Day after day the increasing wickedness and pain unleashed on humans pushed volcanic to erupt and pour out his burning wrath upon the evil system of the world enslaving humanity.Although being a hero is about the shortest-lived profession on earth, the hero Volcanic lives-on as a burning flame in the hearts of humanity who daily fight evil by his flame of freedom, setting the world free from the evil system ruling men.And as gold is purified by fire, the fire of Volcanic will continue to erupt and burn for the purging of the world from every evil and purify the universe to shine as bright as the sun.Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Behind this artwork is a hidden message for all the people of the world - bitcoin is connecting people, and we don't have to work against each other anymore. We can achieve great things by working together towards a common target. The connection is crucial, and it can lead to a brighter future for all of us.In the spirit of Max Stirner, let us embrace our individualism while coming together to overcome the obstacles that stand in our way. The artwork "VOLCANIC – The Purifier of Humanity" must be brought to the forefront to remind us of the power of unity and the importance of working together towards a common goal.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The fourth element is now complete, bringing all four elements together. What's next? The fifth element is coming 100%, and the question is, will there be even more artworks beyond this fifth element?By the way, there's only one edition of the Water artwork left, and one is open for offers. To access the fifth element of Earth, you'll need to have all four artworks.And remember, while there's a 100% certainty of a fifth element, there might be even more artworks coming in this series, not just the hidden fifth element. These series will be very powerful ones. This is growing, and the only way to stop it is my death, but even after my passing, this will continue to flourish.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Crafting the Fire element, my third piece in the series, was an exciting journey. Each flame symbolizes the fight against oppression, with Volcanic's legacy burning bright, purifying the world and illuminating the universe.I want to highlight the ongoing series because I'm currently collaborating on the fifth Element with my sensei. As a reminder, to unlock the special/bonus edition (fifth element), you'll need to possess the four artworks: water, earth, fire, and wind editions. This collection serves as the key to enter the Altar and claim the fifth artwork in the series.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Someone seized them all—the entire Earth Elements series—at the Bitcoin Citadel in Germany! Enchanted by the fire, he was captivated by the series to such an extent that he acquired every piece and now eagerly anticipates the fifth element. With three fire, three water, and so forth, only three sets of the fifth element exist. With 2/3 water already sold, his acquisition of all the initial pieces means that only the complete 3/3 set remains to obtain the fifth element. Otherwise, collectors must trade or assemble the complete series to acquire this masterpiece. He resonated with the essence of these series, understanding the narrative, and now eagerly awaits the fifth element. It was a delight to provide him with these artworks, and I'm certain he'll share an image with all of them together. Thank you and congratulations.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey everyone,The time has come for the fifth element! I'll be posting about it soon in a special thread. To collect the fifth element, you need to have matching numbers from each of the previous elements I created. The collector who has all the 1/3 numbers is okay with sharing this with the community, but there are still some matching numbers left, specifically, all the 3/3s are still available.For the 2/3 elements, there's a bit of a challenge, you'll need to make offers to the collector through Scarce City, because the Water 2/3 was SOLD at the Bitcoin conference in Miami.So, the fifth element is out there, but the question is: what comes next? Where are the collectors, and why did the four elements awaken this mysterious figure? And who is he? Why does he have this particular color? This is just the very beginning of the series, the story starts now, and there's much more art to come. The Pandora's box is open!Thank you to the collectors and congratulations on acquiring these unique pieces. All of them are interactive, with integrated Bitcoin wallets Looking forward to sharing more soon! BTC
